text: He palanakarta apani amake rastraksamata'o dana karechena ebam amake bibhinna tatparya saha byakhya karara bidya sikhiye diyechena. He nabhomandala o bhu-mandalera srasta, apani'i amara karyanirbahi ihakala o parakale. Amake isalamera upara mrtyudana karuna ebam amake sbajanadera sathe milita karuna.
